PHRASE.LANG: A Game About Bouncing is, well, a game about bouncing. You are a ball who must bounce off of bumpers and avoid the missiles those bumpers will throw at you. Level up and earn points to get great prizes! [#Legal]

Un Jeu de rebonds est tout simplement un jeu de rebonds. Vous êtes une balle qui doit rebondir contre des butoirs et éviter les missiles que ces butoirs vous lancent. Passez les niveaux et marquez des points pour gagner des prix ! [#Legal]

A Game About Bouncing is, well, a game about bouncing. You are a ball who must bounce off of bumpers and avoid the missiles those bumpers will throw at you. Level up and earn points to get great prizes! [#Legal]
